Text: Re PNG Local Production July Cc wonderful to me For East Ohio user id is boydh password is boydh For Peoples user id is boydh password is boydh If you guys are still working on the CPA or NYSEG local I MIGHT be able to help with that better so please let me know Im so glad you cleared this up with Sampson Thanks Kara on PM Please respond to To Kara OLUMBIAGAS cc Subject Re PNG Local Production July Actually we should be nominating only month from Power Gas and day from Phillips Production That works out to about day I just spoke to Samson and he agrees the volume for July should only be for the month AND Angie my super fantastic cant say enough good things about her will probably be my boss someday and sometimes acts like it CNG scheduler has agreed to help out any way she can She knows escript pretty well Chat with Doug if you guys agree Angie can use your ID and password and figure out how to run all the reports we need back to January Also we will not know the actuals for July production until September sometime Effective August st the Phillips wells should be transferred to Clintons brand new pool and Clinton will also nominate the Power Gas pool gas Doug John Singer said he does not have any production reports from Heidi With Angies help we could probably clear up the CNG LDC activity fairly easy Let me know what you guys think on PM To cc Kinney Doug Subject PNG Local Production July Hi Paul and Chris Our friend Sampson at Power Gas still maintains that their local production behind PNG has not been nominated for July yet which was dthmonth Did you guys do a deal for this gas too He usually nominates it all on one day so ClintonCES needs to coordinate with him what day to do it on right now the gas is out there on his side on the th I know Heidi nominated the Phillips gas baseloaded thru the month at day but I was not sure about the Power until I checked and sure enough the nom isnt out there yet I can get help nominating it from PNG to get it through CES pool but I want to make sure thats what we need to do Just give me the word and I will call Sampson to get it done but I will make it clear to him that this is the last month hell need to talk to me about it Thank you very much for the clarifications Kara D aka the lone ranger at CES

PNG Local Production July Cc Paul and Chris Our friend Sampson at Power Gas still maintains that their local production behind PNG has not been nominated for July yet which was dthmonth Did you guys do a deal for this gas too He usually nominates it all on one day so ClintonCES needs to coordinate with him what day to do it on right now the gas is out there on his side on the th I know Heidi nominated the Phillips gas baseloaded thru the month at day but I was not sure about the Power until I checked and sure enough the nom isnt out there yet I can get help nominating it from PNG to get it through CES pool but I want to make sure thats what we need to do Just give me the word and I will call Sampson to get it done but I will make it clear to him that this is the last month hell need to talk to me about it Thank you very much for the clarifications Kara D aka the lone ranger at CES

Re July Volume Request for CI customers behind COH Cc that the dthday is going to N not thanks on AM Please respond to To Kara OLUMBIAGAS Charles OLUMBIAGAS Doug OLUMBIAGAS cc Subject July Volume Request for CI customers behind COH The deal number for the gas below is We are using ENA transport and the deliveries are on a secondary basis The deal number is and I added the meter numbers that I used to enter the deals Robert Joann the volumes should not change and CES would like to keep this deal seperate from all other deals Please let me know if there are any questions Forwarded by Chris GermanyHOUECT on AM on PM To cc Dalphon Charles Destephanis Kara Subject July Volume Request for CI customers behind COH Chris and allBelow is our volume request for July for CI customers behind COH Its a similar situation to the one we had in June with CI customers taken over from us by Metromedia Energy We need to do a separate deal to cover these volumes like we did in June Please provide Kara with contract numbers in the morning Also could you please provide the pricing on this deal Thanks COH Supply to CI Customers of MME July MARKET LDC AREAS dth Meter per day COH COH COH N COH COH COH COH COH COH COH COH TOTALS Doug Kinney Ph Fax

TIMET JUNE DEAL Cc Could you please increase Timets deliveries to COH on K to the full dthday for June Thanks Kara Forwarded by Kara DestephanisCESColumbiaGas on AM Charles Dalphon AM To Kara olumbiaGas cc Subject Re TIMET MAY DEAL No they called late last friday they will need the whole Chris will price it at first of month inside ferc TCO APP pool plus cents plus transport Kara Destephanis AM To Charles olumbiaGas cc Subject Re TIMET MAY DEAL Thanks they only want day for June right
BGE Decrease Cc K EU by dth for intraday Was now dth THANKS Kara
BGE Cut Cc dth piece we bought yesterday delivered to BGE off Transco K A was cut by BGE We dont need to make it up bc its daily balancing Thanks Kara
